name_abbreviation: In re Ross Township Election District Reapportionment

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA, JJ.
PAPADAKOS, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: In re ROSS TOWNSHIP ELECTION DISTRICT REAPPORTIONMENT, Lori Heiser, William Gibson, Pauline Gibson, Gene Kazmier, Janet Gaylor, Paul Talbott, Mary Ellen Fallon, Karen Fallon, Lois Waddell, Harry Leas, Frank Straw, Phyllis Straw, Robert Williams, Lon Grant, Peggy Grant, Mary Ellen Ploeger, Kenneth Pinnon, Yvonne Pinnon, Walter Breathaver and Martha Breathaver, Intervenors. opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Order affirmed.
PAPADAKOS, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
ZAPPALA, J., dissents.

attorneys: Clifford B. Levine, David G. Ries, Thorp, Reed & Armstrong, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Robert L. Byer, Eckert, Seamans, Cherin & Mellott, Pittsburgh, for intervenors.
William W. Milnes, Brandt, Milnes & Rea, Pittsburgh, for Ross Tp.
casebody.head_matter:
522 A.2d 553
In re ROSS TOWNSHIP ELECTION DISTRICT REAPPORTIONMENT, Lori Heiser, William Gibson, Pauline Gibson, Gene Kazmier, Janet Gaylor, Paul Talbott, Mary Ellen Fallon, Karen Fallon, Lois Waddell, Harry Leas, Frank Straw, Phyllis Straw, Robert Williams, Lon Grant, Peggy Grant, Mary Ellen Ploeger, Kenneth Pinnon, Yvonne Pinnon, Walter Breathaver and Martha Breathaver, Intervenors. Appeal of ROSS TOWNSHIP REAPPORTIONMENT COMMISSION.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 9, 1987.
Decided March 23, 1987.
Clifford B. Levine, David G. Ries, Thorp, Reed & Armstrong, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Robert L. Byer, Eckert, Seamans, Cherin & Mellott, Pittsburgh, for intervenors.
William W. Milnes, Brandt, Milnes & Rea, Pittsburgh, for Ross Tp.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA, JJ.
